actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A bill to amend section I(a)(I) of Public Law 95-348 (92 Stat. 487) to authorize the appropriation of $3,165,000 for capital improvement projects on Guam for fiscal year 1983.

summary.text: Authorizes appropriations for capital improvement projects on Guam for FY 1983.

titles.title: A bill to amend section I(a)(I) of Public Law 95-348 (92 Stat. 487) to authorize the appropriation of $3,165,000 for capital improvement projects on Guam for fiscal year 1983.
